headline: Fiserv price target raised to $231 from $206 at Goldman Sachs
summary: Goldman Sachs raised the firm’s price target on Fiserv (FI) to $231 from $206 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. Since the election, the median payment technology stock in coverage has increased 18%, with higher beta growth names with pro-cyclical exposure, among other factors, outperforming the most, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm believes fintech is a net beneficiary of a stronger economy and inflation as well as many of the potential policy changes in the new
